Plot: Members of an elite DEA task force find themselves being taken down one by one after they rob a drug cartel safe house.
Title: Sabotage
Actors: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Sam Worthington, Joe Manganiello, Josh Holloway
tomatoConsensus: Sabotage boasts one of Arnold Schwarzenegger's finer post-political performances, but it's wasted in a movie driven by grueling violence that punishes seemingly without purpose.
